# [Interview #1121: Brandon Sanderson Book Signing at JordanCon 8, Entry #2](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=1121#2)

#### Melissa

Could a Rosharan be hemalurgically spiked with a gem or fabrial?

#### Brandon Sanderson

RAFO.
